column3: News;Kampot: A------ woman died in her own bathroom in Sovan Sa Kor village
column8: 38-year-old died from an electric shock.------According to a source
column9: she tripped in the hallway and grabbed hold of the mains going into the fuse board and the live mains wire touched her neck
column11: then she fell into the bathroom.------The family have taken the body to celebrate the traditional funeral festivals.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/275207
